body.name: Projector with Wifi and Bluetooth, CoolEeve 1080P 12000 Lumens Portable Movie Video Mini Projector Outdoor Indoor, Home Theater Projector Compatible with iOS/ Android/Windows/TV Stick/HDMI/USB/VGA/AV
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 11 hrs 34 mins
features: 🔴【Projector with Wifi and Bluetooth】 CoolEeve projector with wifi and bluetooth, You can use your phone to mirror cast the screen, you can do other operations on your phone normally while casting the screen, it's more convenient for you to use, and the bluetooth can conect to other audio devices, allowing you to independently choose a better source of sound！

🔴【12000Lumens Hd Upgraded Projector】CoolEeve projection has a native resolution of 1920*1080 and 12000 Lumens for sharper, adopted the latest color reproduction technology, every details on the screen is accurately restored to ensure a real and color-vibrant viewing effect.

🔴【Best Sound Quality & Self-Contained Speaker】 CoolEeve adopting the latest Bluetooth 5.1 technology, relax yourself in a private space, get the happiness by connecting the speaker. Self-contained speaker preservation the original sound, just enjoy it!

🔴【Multi-Device Connection】 CoolEeve portable projector support multi device connection, support iOS, Android, windows, USB, HDMI, VGA, AV, TV Stick to let you choose. And support wifi and wired connection for screen casting.

🔴【2 Year Warranty Service】 CoolEeve team provide you a high-quality products and 2 year warranty service, please rest assured! Projector support multi lay way to convenient for you to watch, front, rear, and ceiling cast. Just enjoy your fun home theater!

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 5.0 5.0 out of 5 stars 27 ratings 5.0 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bringing your world to life, one projection at a time! Introducing our state-of-the-art projector, designed to bring your presentations, movies, and games to life with stunning clarity and vibrant colors. Our projector features high-resolution display, easy connectivity options, and advanced image processing technology, ensuring a seamless and immersive viewing experience. Whether you're in a boardroom, classroom, or home theater, our projector is the perfect companion for all your visual needs. Say goodbye to dull and blurry projections, and say hello to the future of visual excellence. Upgrade to our projector today and see the difference for yourself.

CoolEeve projector with wifi and bluetooth CoolEeve cutting-edge projector with built-in WiFi and Bluetooth capabilities. With seamless wireless connectivity, you can easily stream content from your smartphone, tablet, or laptop, eliminating the hassle of tangled cables. The WiFi feature allows for effortless access to online content, while the Bluetooth connectivity enables convenient pairing with external speakers or other devices. Enjoy the freedom to project your favorite media with ease and convenience, making this projector the perfect choice for modern presentations, entertainment, and more. Experience the next level of versatility and connectivity with our WiFi and Bluetooth-enabled projector.

Suitable for a wide range of scenarios CoolEeve versatile projector is the ultimate companion for a wide range of activities and events. Whether you're hosting an outdoor sports viewing party, enjoying a movie night under the stars, or giving a professional presentation at work, our projector is the perfect solution. Its portable design makes it easy to take anywhere, while its high-quality display ensures crisp and clear images in any setting. Additionally, it makes an ideal gift for friends and family who appreciate the latest in entertainment technology. With its ability to adapt to various usage scenarios, our projector is the go-to choice for all your projection needs!

Multiple mounting options Our projector offers versatile installation options to suit your specific needs. Whether you prefer desktop mounting for easy access and portability, ceiling mounting for a streamlined and space-saving setup, or bracket mounting for a secure and stable display, our projector can be effortlessly configured to accommodate your preferred installation method. With its adaptable design, you have the flexibility to customize the placement of the projector to best suit your environment, ensuring a seamless and optimized viewing experience. Enjoy the convenience and freedom to install our projector in the manner that best fits your requirements!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I recently snagged this gem, and let me tell you, it's been a total upgrade for my at-home entertainment setup. First off, the size is deceptive – it's mini but mighty. No need for a giant screen – just fire it up, and boom, you've got a cinema in your living room. The fact that it's got WiFi and Bluetooth is a game-changer – no more wrestling with cords or playing DJ hopscotch with your playlist. The remote control is like the magic wand of laziness – change the movie, adjust the volume, all without leaving the comfort of your couch.But here's the real magic – the picture quality. It's like having a 4K theater right at home. I've thrown everything from Netflix binges to epic gaming sessions on it, and it delivers every time. Setting it up is a breeze, even for tech novices like me. If you want to level up your home entertainment without breaking the bank, this mini projector is the unsung hero you've been waiting for. Movie nights will never be the same again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's easy to project content onto the screen.
reviews.reviewText: The portability of this projector pleasantly surprised me. It supports WiFi and Bluetooth functions and allows screen mirroring through a mobile phone. This means I can perform other tasks on my phone while enjoying the convenience of projection. Whether in home entertainment or business presentations, it's easy to project content onto the screen, bringing greater convenience to both life and work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works great! Not only can it easily connect to Wi-Fi at home, but it can also interconnect with mobile phones through Bluetooth. It has become my right-hand assistant when watching movies at home, without the need for cumbersome cables, everything has become so convenient. Moreover, the convenient operation of the projector allows me to enjoy more unrestrained audio-visual entertainment, which is extremely convenient.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick connection and smooth transmission
reviews.reviewText: I really like its compact design; initially, my friends had no idea what it was for until I connected it to my phone. I appreciate its adaptive functionality, providing me with numerous mounting options, allowing me to set it up and use it anywhere in my home within 5 minutes. I'm thankful for its quick connection and seamless data transmission, providing us with an excellent entertainment experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars more colorful and immersive!
reviews.reviewText: With this portable projector, our home theater experience has been greatly enhanced! It has Wi-Fi and Bluetooth capabilities, allowing us to easily project movies, games, and other content from our phones onto a large screen for viewing. The projector's image quality is also excellent, with vibrant colors and clear details, providing a cinema-like audiovisual experience. With this projector, our home theater experience is more colorful and immersive!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This has become the highlight of all my date nights! The design is sleek and pocket-sized – setting up a cozy movie night has never been this easy. It's like a romantic movie night date right in my living room. The versatility is a date night godsend (especially when you don't want to plan); with WiFi, we can seamlessly stream anything from romantic classics to the latest releases. The Bluetooth feature adds a touch of magic; we can curate our own soundtrack for the evening. It's like having a personal cinema and DJ combo for the perfect date night. The image quality sets the mood just right; it feels like our own private screening. Cleanup is a breeze too; just tuck it back into its portable pouch. If you're on the hunt for a date night game-changer that turns your living room into a romantic cinema, this smart mini projector is perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's easy to use
reviews.reviewText: This projector supports connections to various devices, including iOS, Android, Windows, USB, HDMI, VGA, AV, TV Stick, and more. Its wide compatibility allows easy connection regardless of the device used, making the projection process more flexible and diverse, it supports both WiFi and wired connections for screen casting, meeting the needs of different scenarios.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was impressed after purchasing this smart projector! It supports Wifi and Bluetooth delivers excellent native 4K and 1080P projection allows me to enjoy a cinematic experience at home. I can indulge in a variety of content on the big screen, it's a powerful and outstanding smart projector—I highly recommend it!
